title: LFT
body:
Gold 5 currently though plan to be gold 4 possibly today even, I have been playing for quite some time as early back as possibly end of season 1 so i have played all the champs at least a few times before so I'm fully willing to practice certain champs for wanted team comps. I would say my main roles would probably be top and ADC at the moment though if your team is looking for another role i would be happy to trial with the team and practice in my spare time the role. As for communication i am more then happy to use any program i already have or install another if needed. 

If you are interested feel free to add me on league IGN: Hashshashin or message me on here and ill respond to any questions or add you myself.
